Caption: The chief guest, Prof. Maneklal Sankalchand Thacker (director general of the Council of Scientific and Industrial Research), converses with Prof. A. Ramachandran (Director) and an un-identified individual (possibly the artist) at the event held to unveil the portrait of Prof. B. Sengupto, the first Director of IIT Madras
Event: Unveiling of the Portrait of Prof Sengupto
Description: A special event was held at the Instituteâ€™s Open Air Theatre (1968) in honour of Prof. B. Sengupto, the first Director of IIT Madras. The event consisted of the unveiling of a life size portrait (of the former director) and a series of speeches given by the dignitaries who were present at the event. The chief guest for the event was Prof. Maneklal Sankalchand Thacker, an Indian power engineer, academic and the director general of the Council of Scientific and Industrial Research, the largest research and development organization in India. In the image the dignitaries are seen conversing with one another at the venue. From the left: Prof. A. Ramachandran (Director), Prof. M.S. Thacker (chief guest and Director General, CSIR) and an individual who is yet to be identified (possibly the portrait artist)
